29 const char *name);

32 const char *pkgname,
33 const char *seinfo,
34 uid_t uid);
35
36extern int selinux_log_callback(int type, const char *fmt, ...)
37 __attribute__ ((format(printf, 2, 3)));

39#define SELINUX_ANDROID_RESTORECON_NOCHANGE 1
40#define SELINUX_ANDROID_RESTORECON_VERBOSE 2
41#define SELINUX_ANDROID_RESTORECON_RECURSE 4
42#define SELINUX_ANDROID_RESTORECON_FORCE 8
43#define SELINUX_ANDROID_RESTORECON_DATADATA 16
44extern int selinux_android_restorecon(const char *file, unsigned int flags);
45

47 const char *seinfo,
48 uid_t uid,
49 unsigned int flags);
